content.body: Ben Ho: Or even write up a patch to the docs — and feel free to Cc me on it, and I’ll review it. https://github.com/sideshowbarker https://github.com/mdn/content/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md. Or if you prefer to just raise an issue, please Cc me on it, and I can write up a patch
content.formatted_body: Ben Ho: Or even write up a patch to the docs — and feel free to Cc me on it, and I’ll review it. https://github.com/sideshowbarker https://github.com/mdn/content/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md. Or if you prefer to just raise an issue, please Cc me on it, and I can write up a patch
